name: Client Portal : SuiteDash Direct Login
author: SuiteDash :: ONE DashboardÂ®

sections.description:
SuiteDash : All-in-One Business Software

Visit Website >> SuiteDash.com is the home of SuiteDash, an all-in-one SaaS tool for all of your Client Portal, CRM, Sales Funnel, Appointment Scheduling, Proposals, File Sharing, Project Management, Invoicing, eSigning, LMS, Email Marketing needs.

IMPORTANT :: What is the SuiteDash WordPress Plugin?

This plugin allows you to add a customized login functionality directly on your WordPress site, and have that login tied-in to your SuiteDash account. This allows you, your staff, and your clients to login to your SuiteDash environment directly from your site, without ever needing to visit the SuiteDash login page.

SuiteDash customers with a Custom URL set up are able to integrate their custom URLs with this plugin!

SuiteDash is in constant development, and is updated daily with new features and streamlining. It is also fully supported, and your suggestions are welcome.

See a full list of SuiteDash features at SuiteDash.com
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the SuiteDash WordPress plugin and get it working.

  • Upload the newest version using ‘Add new’ Plugin (WordPress -> Plugins -> Add New), Upload via zip, Upload, and then Activate – OR – Unzip the files on your local machine and upload via FTP to the /plugins/ directory.. then activate from the plugins list.
sections.faq:
How do I get a SuiteDash account?

You can sign up for a risk-free 14-Day Free Trial of SuiteDash : No credit card required : Sign up HERE
